title: Unakena Iruppen Lyrics Kadhal
stanzas:
Unakena iruppen
uyiraiyum koduppen
unnai naan pirinthaal
unakku mun irappaen.
kanmaniye..
kanmaniye..
azhuvathaen kanmaniye
vazhithunai naan irukka.

Unakena iruppen
uyiraiyum koduppen
unnai naan pirinthaal
unakku mun irappaen.

minsaara kambigal meedhu
mayinaakkal koodu kattum
nam kadhal thadaigalai
thaandum.

valaiyaamal nadhigal illai
valikkaamal vazhkai illai
varum kaalam kaayam aatrum.

nilavoliyai mattum andri
ilai ellaam vazhvathillai
minminiyum oli kodukkum.

thandhaiyum thaaiyaiyum
thaandi vandhaai
thozhiye endrume
irandumaai naan iruppen

tholile neeyume saayum podhu
edhirvarum thuyarangal
anaithaiyum naan edhirppen

venneeril nee kulikka
viragaagi thee kulippen
udhirathil unnai kalappen

vizhi moodum podhum unnai
piriyaamal naan irukka
kanavukkul kaaval iruppen

naan endraal naane illai
neethaane naanaai aanen.
nee azhuthaal naan thudippen.

Unakena iruppen
uyiraiyum koduppen
unnai naan pirinthaal
unakku mun irappaen.
kanmaniye..
kanmaniye..
azhuvathaen kanmaniye
vazhithunai naan irukka.

seo.title: Unakena Iruppen Lyrics Kadhal
seo.description: Get the complete Unakena Iruppen Lyrics Kadhal from Kadhal. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Joshua Sridhar and sung by Haricharan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Kadhal, Joshua Sridhar, Haricharan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
